tweet: @CryptoHayes This is a fantastic example of strength of building entirely off Bitcoin and how blockchain can be leveraged to enhance traditional centralized exchanges. It even requires running a Bitcoin node and verifying everything from first principles, Satoshi would be proud.
name: Kyle Soska

tweet: Our own audits imply their reserves to be approximately 72,148 BTC at block 763,269, or 0.33% over @BitMEX 's    claimed value ( https://t.co/EIJ8Irhx94) and well within our expected error.  Don't trust, verify! @CryptoHayes
